CustomField.formula: NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(TransportationMode__c)) || ISBLANK(TEXT(Status__c)) || ISBLANK(LoadingDate__c) ) && ISPICKVAL(TransportationMode__c, "ShippingOnly") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Reception") && NOW() > DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(LoadingDate__c -1) & " 6:00:00") /* 6:00:00Z のGMT = 15時JST */
CustomField.label: 翌日出荷受付（倉庫）遅延フラグ
